ygData.subject: Re: Hello...I am new here....yes...yes I am
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for the site. I was needing a site to help with the development of my lvl 6 gnome mage. Martondo Zeb server ... a ... 34 or ... fight ... 42 mage ...
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for the site. I was needing a site to help with the
development of my lvl 6 gnome mage.

Martondo
Zeb server

--- In EverQuest@y..., Biltilie Dwimmerlaik <biltilie@m...> wrote:
> Sean O'Connor wrote:
>
> > What server are you on? Mr. lvl 32 mage and If i may suggest find
a
> > decent group inside of Dalnir to go up a few level, once you hit
34 or
> > so go to Iceclad, then after 39 porgress to Eastern wastes Id say
fight
> > there till 44 you can do IC and EW solo or in a group, Im a lvl
42 mage
>
>
> for 46/47 to 50 do bloodgills in LOIO ... i did 48/49 in one day,
but
>
> after that day it was really good to see the sun again ... ;-)
>
> maybe you should also check with "The Magician's Tower" at
>
> http://pub6.ezboard.com/bthemagicianstower
>
> IMHO this is a must for mages.
>
>
>
> Biltilie Dwimmerlaik
> level 53 female gnome magician
> Tarew Marr
